name: Patient
description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

active.short: Whether this patient's record is in active use
active.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it may be used to mark that the resource was created in error

name.short: A name associated with the patient

telecom.short: A contact detail for the individual

birthDate.short: The date of birth for the individual

deceasedBoolean.short: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not
deceasedBoolean.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because once a patient is marked as deceased, the actions that are appropriate to perform on the patient may be significantly different.

deceasedDateTime.short: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not
deceasedDateTime.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because once a patient is marked as deceased, the actions that are appropriate to perform on the patient may be significantly different.

multipleBirthBoolean.short: Whether patient is part of a multiple birth

multipleBirthInteger.short: Whether patient is part of a multiple birth

contact.short: A contact party (e.g. guardian, partner, friend) for the patient

name.short: A name associated with the contact person

telecom.short: A contact detail for the person

organization.short: Organization that is associated with the contact

period.short: The period during which this contact person or organization is valid to be contacted relating to this patient

pat-1.human: SHALL at least contain a contact's details or a reference to an organization
pat-1.expression: name.exists() or telecom.exists() or address.exists() or organization.exists()

communication.short: A language which may be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health

language.short: The language which can be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health

managingOrganization.short: Organization that is the custodian of the patient record

link.short: Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual person
link.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it may not be the main Patient resource, and the referenced patient should be used instead of this Patient record. This is when the link.type value is 'replaced-by'

other.short: The other patient or related person resource that the link refers to
